name: CardStrike
description:
In this short game, you have just started organising at work. It is a card swiping decision game, in which you can swipe left and right to make decisions. Each decision effects "workers' power", "capital's power", "the state", and "your resources" - the consequences of each decision will effect these in different ways.

Make choices and then lead towards a strike!

By Jamie Woodcock

Made with:

Unity and Card Swiping Decision Game Asset for Unity

Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
